text: 9|109|Allahvin tirupporuttattai nati, paricutta(mana enna)ttin mite masjitin astivarattai amaittavan mela? Allatu (carintuvitak kutiyavaru) otaiyin arukil atuvum carintu avanutan naraka neruppil vilakkutiyavaru masjitin astivarattai amaittavan mela? (Ittakaiya) aniyayakkara makkalai allah nerana valiyil celuttuvatillai
